content.body: OK, so if I have this right, ```<``` is always needed, ```>``` is never needed, ```&``` is only needed when certain characters follow it, so safer to just use it in all circumstances, and ```"``` and ```'``` are only needed when used in attributes using those characters as the quote marks. All other entities are not necessary at all, since unicode takes care of character handling.
